channel.title: X-plane Simulator
channel.description: who had played X-plane Simulator? (version 9) or other recent versions...I want to know to setup the controls...engine start engine stop plane handling how I increase altitude or how to landing how I change plane directions, or to do acrobatics can anyone help me? to take a screenshot and indicate me this controls

item.title: X-plane Simulator
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
I dunno if you’ll find many X-plane players in here

But seems like you’re just looking at simple controls. Why the hell are you using X-plane for that?? seems abit like overkill…
